import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update event type by ID"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/events/types/{EventTypeId}/update"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates an existing event type using the supplied ID and payload. Use this to rename categories, adjust scope visibility, or update icon metadata.

**Prerequisites**
1. **EventTypeId** - Use [POST /api/v1.0/events/types/query](/docs/api/events/get-event-types-by-query-post) and extract `Items[].EventTypeId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. List event types: [POST /api/v1.0/events/types/query](/docs/api/events/get-event-types-by-query-post) -&gt; extract `Items[].EventTypeId`.
2. Build `UpdateEventTypeRequest` with the fields to change.
3. Update type: [PUT /api/v1.0/events/types/\{EventTypeId\}/update](/docs/api/events/update-event-type).

**Minimal Required Fields**: EventTypeId (path) plus at least one field to update (commonly `Name` or `Scope`).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"EventTypeId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request model for creating or updating an event type.","properties":{"EventTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Event type ID (required for updates)."},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Site scope for site-specific event types."},"Scope":{"type":"string","enum":["All","System","Global","Site","App","User","Role","Team"],"description":"Visibility scope of the event type."},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Display name of the event type."},"Icon":{"type":"string","description":"Icon identifier for the event type."}},"title":"UpdateEventTypeRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Updated successfully.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Standard response for event and event type update operations. Returns the updated item ID, success status, and any validation errors.","properties":{"ItemId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"IsSuccess":{"type":"boolean"},"Errors":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"Standard error payload returned by the API when a request fails.","properties":{"StatusCode":{"type":"integer","description":"HTTP status code associated with the failure","example":401},"Message":{"type":"string","description":"Human-readable description of the error","example":"Attempted to perform an unauthorized operation."}},"required":["StatusCode","Message"],"title":"ErrorResponse"}}},"title":"EventsUpdateResponse"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
